description:
UNBEATABLE is a rhythm game where music is illegal and you do crimes.
UNBEATABLE Arcade Mode is a game mode separate from the story mode, where you can play songs from the game (and other places) to your heart's content.

v0.1.0-alpha.description:
The first release!

Check [the README](https://github.com/AllPoland/unbeatAP/blob/main/README.md) for installation instructions.

The mod and apworld are both still early in development, and are not feature complete nor are there guarantees about stability.

**Please read the YAML options carefully and test your options before joining a lobby**, since the pacing and difficulty of the apworld is very volatile. It's currently very easy to make a randomizer that is way too short or way too long.

Any feedback or ideas are welcome in the "UNBEATABLE (PC)" thread in `#future-game-design` in the [Archipelago Discord](https://discord.gg/8Z65BR2)!
v0.1.0-alpha.title: v0.1.0 Alpha

v0.1.1-alpha.description:
You know, when you release a randomizer, the randomizer fundamentally changes.

This patch fixes as many known issues as possible while maintaining compatibility with v0.1.0. This means **you can (and should) update the client to this version if you still have a game running on v0.1.0**. (You should update the apworld ASAP too!)

apworld changes:
- Song items now follow progression balancing, improving pacing in multiplayer lobbies
- Added the "Non-local Traps" setting as a shorthand to add all trap items to "Non-local Items"
- Improved the detail and clarity of several options, and improved some default values

client changes:
- Fixed an issue where an out-of-range port would lock up the connection screen
- Fixed an issue where the game would stop responding while connecting if many items have been collected
- Fixed an issue where pressing `J` while typing in an input field would open the options menu
- Fixed an ugly layout issue with the connection screen
- Traps are no longer cancelled when quitting or failing a song
- The effects of Zoom Traps have been reduced, and the default duration of all traps has been increased

Check [the README](https://github.com/AllPoland/unbeatAP/blob/main/README.md) for installation instructions.

The mod and apworld are both still early in development, and are not feature complete nor are there guarantees about stability.

**Please read the YAML options carefully and test your options before joining a lobby**, since the pacing and difficulty of the apworld is very volatile. It's currently very easy to make a randomizer that is way too short or way too long.

Any feedback or ideas are welcome in the "UNBEATABLE (PC)" thread in `#future-game-design` in the [Archipelago Discord](https://discord.gg/8Z65BR2)!
v0.1.1-alpha.title: v0.1.1 Alpha

v0.1.2-alpha.description:
The obligatory hotfix for the thing that goes wrong after the first update.

This fixes an issue where YAMLs generated with the Options Creator tool would be missing the `skill_rating` entry, which completely breaks progression.
If you have a YAML submitted for an upcoming game, **please check if this issue has affected you and update/resubmit as necessary!**

**This is ONLY an apworld update!** There are no changes to the client.

Check [the README](https://github.com/AllPoland/unbeatAP/blob/main/README.md) for installation instructions.

The mod and apworld are both still early in development, and are not feature complete nor are there guarantees about stability.

**Please read the YAML options carefully and test your options before joining a lobby**, since the pacing and difficulty of the apworld is very volatile. It's currently very easy to make a randomizer that is way too short or way too long.

Any feedback or ideas are welcome in the "UNBEATABLE (PC)" thread in `#future-game-design` in the [Archipelago Discord](https://discord.gg/8Z65BR2)!
v0.1.2-alpha.title: v0.1.2 Alpha

v0.2.0-alpha.description:
Thanks to work from @estradiol-valerate, this update brings the songs added in game patch 1.7.1 to the randomizer, as well as some songs that were already present but missing from the rando.

Additionally, there are a few fixes:
- Fixed an issue that caused connection to take a really long time (fixed by @estradiol-valerate)
- Skill rating is now on a 1000x scale instead of a 100x scale. This should hopefully be more intuitive, since the game always displays rating with three decimal places (now a rating of 5.318 translates to skill rating 5318 in the YAML).
- Removed the "non-local traps" option, as it caused a lot of generation failures when used. It is still possible to place traps in non-local items manually.

This update is **NOT compatible** with v0.1.x! You will have to update both the client and apworld together and generate a new game.

Check [the README](https://github.com/AllPoland/unbeatAP/blob/main/README.md) for installation instructions.

The mod and apworld are both still early in development, and are not feature complete nor are there guarantees about stability.

**Please read the YAML options carefully and test your options before joining a lobby**, since the pacing and difficulty of the apworld is very volatile. It's currently very easy to make a randomizer that is way too short or way too long.

Any feedback or ideas are welcome in the "UNBEATABLE (PC)" thread in `#future-game-design` in the [Archipelago Discord](https://discord.gg/8Z65BR2)!
v0.2.0-alpha.title: v0.2.0 Alpha

v0.2.1-alpha.description:
This update comes with a fix to generation issues, as well as some much needed QOL features!

APworld changes:
- Fixed generation errors where location count did not match item count (thanks to [@gerbiljames](https://github.com/gerbiljames))
- Added a song blacklist option - add any songs you *don't* want to include in the randomizer here. Useful if you don't want to play bookend for 30 minutes or a friend's apworld is too weak to handle Clef's greatness

Client changes:
- Added more configuration for death link - you can now separately choose whether or not to trigger deathlink on restarting/quitting a song (thanks to @estradiol-valerate)
- Added a notification popup for sending/receiving items (also thanks to @estradiol-valerate)
  - Notification popups can also be configured in the mod settings!

This release is **compatible** with v0.2.0!

Check [the README](https://github.com/AllPoland/unbeatAP/blob/main/README.md) for installation instructions.

The mod and apworld are both still early in development, and are not feature complete nor are there guarantees about stability.

**Please read the YAML options carefully and test your options before joining a lobby**, since the pacing and difficulty of the apworld is very volatile. It's currently very easy to make a randomizer that is way too short or way too long.

Any feedback or ideas are welcome in the "UNBEATABLE (PC)" thread in `#future-game-design` in the [Archipelago Discord](https://discord.gg/8Z65BR2)!
v0.2.1-alpha.title: v0.2.1 Alpha
